extends AbstractGameObject

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bird

        public Bird()
        The default constructor. Creates a Bird at coordinates [BIRD_X_POS, SCENE_WIDTH / 2] with velocities (horizontal and vertical) and rotation set to 0, and all booleans set to false.

    • Method Detail

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Get whether this Bird is dead
        Returns:
        whether the Bird is dead.

      • kill

        public void kill()
        Kill this Bird (set dead to true)

      • flap

        public void flap(double amount)
        Changes this Bird's velocity to amount
        Parameters:
        amount - the new velocity

      • fall

        public void fall()
        Causes the Bird to fall. The y position of the Bird is increased by the velocity, and then the velocity is changed by the vertical (y) acceleration.

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(Column col)
        Is this Bird hitting the given Column col?
        Returns:
        whether this Bird is hitting col

      • checkOutOfBounds

        public boolean checkOutOfBounds()
        Is the given Bird out of bounds? (Bounded by FlappyBirdConstants.SCENE_WIDTH and FlappyBirdConstants.SCENE_HEIGHT)
        Returns:
        whether this Bird is out of bounds

      • setFlapHeight

        public void setFlapHeight(double flapHeight)
        Sets this Bird's flap height
        Parameters:
        flapHeight - the new flap height

      • getFlapHeight

        public double getFlapHeight()
        Gets this Bird's flap height
        Returns:
        the flap height
